comment: The beer came out very good surprisingly given the problems with the grind and the under boil.  Lighter than targeted and lower alcohol but it is very tasty on 1/31/14.  Suggestions for next batch:  90 minutes boil (from 60), check grind carefully.  Use the 1/4 cup mocha chips again - this imparted a nice complex character to the brew.  No other changes needed!
